column1: Art Institute of Chicago////As I have gotten older
column2: I still have a penchant for the Thorne Rooms
column3: but I also adore their curated exhibits and permanent collections.  My true favorite now
column5: is that the Art Institute is a veritable melting pot.  It is a destination for locals and tourists alike which means that with every turn of the head you can hear different languages and spy different cultures.  That alone is worth the price of admission.
